title: Subway RP cards
body: so i bought a subway card that lets u pick from $15-500 and i put $60 but it keeps saying that its not valid and my friend said just wait at most an hour and it'll probably work but its been almost 3 hours and it doesn't work. Plz help me

replies.body: When submitting your code from the card, make sure you are using the Purchase RP section of the store and not the Code Redemption page.  Select Purchase RP, then Gift Cards & more.  It should then open a page for Openbucks.  If you are still experiencing an issue, please [submit a ticket t](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)o our billing team who can help you out further.
